Text: Richard Gunn (actor):  He is best known for portraying Calvin "Sketchy" Theodore in the Fox series "Dark Angel" (2000–2002), Chief of Police John Sanders in the BYU TV series Granite Flats, and Aitor Quantic in the third and final season of the Netflix original series "Hemlock Grove".
